sen.j: 五世梅若吉之丞（ごせい うめわか きちのじょう）とは、シテ方観世流能楽師。
sen.e: Kichinojo UMEWAKA the 5th is a Noh actor of the Kanze school of lead actors (shite-kata).
Kichinojo UMEWAKA the Fifth is a Noh actor of the Kanze school of shite-kata (lead actors).
sen.cmt: the 5th→the Fifth、lead actors (shite-kata)→shite-kata (lead actors)としました。
sen.e: Kichinojo UMEWAKA the Fifth is a Noh actor of the Kanze school of shite-kata (lead actors).
He lives in Takarazuka City.
He lives in Takarazuka City.
He lives in Takarazuka City.
His former name is Noriyoshi.
His former name is Noriyoshi.

He is the eldest son of Naoyoshi UMEWAKA.

sen.j: 梅若万三郎 (2世)は伯父、梅若万三郎 (3世)は従兄弟に当たる。
sen.e: Manzaburo UMEWAKA the 2nd is his uncle; Manzaburo UMEWAKA the 3rd is his cousin.
Manzaburo UMEWAKA the Second is his uncle; Manzaburo UMEWAKA the Third is his cousin.
Manzaburo UMEWAKA the Second is his uncle; Manzaburo UMEWAKA the Third is his cousin.
